data.text: @RepBrianBabin @POTUS 38 kids were killed, 71 wounded, 1.5 mln in the areas affected by the shelling in @Ukraine. We call on to #CloseTheSky or at least to provide us with fighter jets, anti-rocket and anti-aircraft defense. Putin will not stop until he is stopped! #ProtectUASky 🇺🇦 #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/4q5vAf5S44
@RepBrianBabin @POTUS Why this vaccine and not all the other ones required for school or military service?  At least explain that.

@RepBrianBabin @POTUS So, C19 vaccines are bad, but not allowing women to have freedom of medical choice for themselves is good? Thanks for illustrating the duality of the GOP. “Freedom of medical choice” and all that.
@RepBrianBabin @POTUS Why don't you hop in your little truck and honk your horn, maybe someone will listen? https://t.co/0snsMOMDpK
@RepBrianBabin @POTUS LOL!! As if you would vote for any legislation this administration puts forth anyway. This is like the guy who never eats at McDonalds saying he’s going to boycott them.

@RepBrianBabin @POTUS 74% of Americans believe that NATO should #CloseTheSky over #Ukraine. Give us at least fighter jets, anti-rocket and anti-aircraft defense so we can defend ourselves! Putin will not stop until he is stopped! #ProtectUASky #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/UIf761vDQm

@RepBrianBabin @POTUS The signatories on this letter tell us to not really take it that seriously (in particular Roy & MTG).

Also hard to take the military bit seriously, given all of the other vaccine requirements on them historically. What happened to Republicans demanding our soldiers be "tough"?

@RepBrianBabin @All435Reps @POTUS Baby Babin your job is not to write letter it’s to write legislation. If you have time to tweet you have time to write a bill. Let’s see whatcha got. Maybe figure out how to get American oil and gas production. Biden isn’t stopping them from their 13.9 million acres. Try harder.
